title: Learn about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the dead dreaming, the interpretation of dreams of the dead dying again, and the interpretation of dreams of the dead dying twice.

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the death of a dead person. Interpreters believe that the vision indicates kindness, especially if the dreamer cries in the dream. Interpretation of a dream about the dead by Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of a dream about dead people dying? Seeing a dead person dying in a dream and crying over him without screaming means that the dreamer will marry a woman who is a descendant of that dead person. Or it indicates that a relative of the deceased will get married soon. If an individual sees himself crying over the death of a loved one in his dream, and this person has been dead for a long time, this may be a reflection of the dreamer’s sadness and longing for the deceased, as the dream shows relief from him. Anxiety and freedom from difficulties and problems in life. If the dreamer was sick and saw himself attending the funeral of the deceased and felt very sorry for him and cried silently in his dream, then the vision brought him good news of his near recovery and ridding his body of diseases, indicating that God Almighty would compensate him for every moment of pain he experienced and give him happiness. And peace of mind.Interpretation of a dream about the dead by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that the vision is good because it shows blessings in health, money, and longevity, and freedom from problems and worries. However, if the dreamer sees a dead person he knows dying again in his dream and people are screaming at him and screaming loudly, this portends bad luck because it may indicate the death of a relative of the deceased. If the dreamer is going through a certain crisis in his life at the present time and dreams that he is crying sadly over a dead person he knows, This leads to his exit from this crisis in the near future, and the vision indicates an improvement in his condition in general and the emergence of many positive changes in his life. An Egyptian website, the largest website specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just write: Egyptian Dream Interpretation Website. Search on Google and get interpretations. Correct.Interpretation of a dream about the death of a dead man for an unmarried woman. If an unmarried woman sees herself attending the funeral of a dead person she knows and does not feel sorry or cry during the vision, this indicates that she will marry a handsome, kind-hearted young man, whom she will fall in love with in the first sight. And she lives her most beautiful moments with him. If the dreamer sees her dead friend dying again in her dream, this means that God (Almighty) will lead her and guide her to the right path. The dream indicates that her life will completely change for the better soon, but in the event that the dreaming woman gets engaged and sees the deceased dying in a bed Clean and organized, this heralds the approaching wedding date and indicates that she will live happily and comfortably throughout her life under the guardianship of her husband. An indication that the Lord (Glory be to Him) will guide her in her life and bestow upon her many blessings and gifts because she was patient when she suffered and did not panic and was satisfied with the decree of God Almighty. So she rewards her with goodness and recognizes her eyes so that her dreams come true and her prayers are answered. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a dead man for a married woman. If the dreamer does not cry in the dream, the vision is good and indicates that she will soon hear wonderful news that will make her happy and rejoice her heart. The dream indicates that she will bear great responsibilities that exceed her capabilities, which will It may lead to a deterioration in her mental and physical health, so she must seek help from someone in her life to protect her

title: Interpretation of seeing a dog in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dog in a dream by Ibn Sirin: If a person sees a dog barking in his dream, this is evidence that he is an obedient and hateful person and will change his life. Seeing hunting dogs in a dream is a sign of kindness and abundant money. Seeing a person leaning on a dog in his dream indicates his victory in some life affairs Which he is experiencing. Seeing a person with a dog barking at him indicates that there is an enemy for him in this world and you must be careful of him. Seeing sick dogs in a dream is evidence of the illness of that person who sees the dream. When you see dogs that were on a hunting trip and traveled to the city, This indicates the disappearance of fear and anxiety. Whoever sees himself in a dream killing dogs, this is evidence of his victory over enemies. When you see a person playing with a dog, this indicates that he will mix with non-Muslims. Seeing a sea dog in a dream is an indication of the imminent fulfillment of the desires he seeks. The person. When a person dreams that he is eating a dog, this is an indication that he will eliminate all his enemies and enjoy psychological comfort. When dogs chase the dreamer, this is evidence of the presence of envy and haters in his life. Seeing a dog in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried girl who sees a dog in her dream indicates the presence of A malicious person in her life if the dog is black. When an unmarried woman sees a white dog in a dream, this is evidence of a good friendship, unlike seeing a brown dog, this indicates hatred and malice. Interpretation of a dog in a dream for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman sees a dog in her dream, this Evidence of the presence of some hatred and envy in her life, and they are the people closest to her. If a woman is divorced and sees a dog in her dream, this indicates that there is someone who covets her wealth and money. Interpretation of a dream about a dog for a married woman When a married woman sees a dog in a dream, this is evidence of the presence of an evil man In her life, it is closer to the interpretation of an unmarried girl who sees a dog, and the woman in this case must avoid some men who are. She is present in her life and wants to destroy her life with her husband. Add the dream you would like to interpret in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and explain it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about hunting by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about fishing in a dream. The vision of fishing is one of the important visions associated with abundance in life and the benefits in life that the dreamer will achieve soon, but the interpretation varies according to the number, size, and type of fish, and we will learn through this article about the interpretation of the vision for a man, wife, pregnant woman, and single person. Interpretation of a dream about fishing. Fishing in The dream is a lot of livelihood and a lot of money that the viewer will earn soon, but after a lot of fatigue and effort in life, if the number of fish is many. As for fishing without scales, it is also money, but in an illegal way. Fishing from a well is a symbol of bad temper, brutality, and cruelty in dealing with others, and he must change this method. As for fishing by hand, it is a high social status and an indication of the presence of many loyal friends around him. Ibn Shaheen says that catching fish easily symbolizes pleasant situations that happen to the fortuneteller, making him feel comfortable and happy. Interpretation of a dream about fishing by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that catching a fish in a dream from a narrow well is a vision that portends that something bad will happen to the dreamer and he must be careful. The vision Fishing from turbid or dirty water is a loss of money and distress at the same time, while seeing fish spines in a dream is a sign of losing something important and valuable in life. Seeing fishing in a dream for an unmarried young man symbolizes the approaching date of marriage and a feeling of comfort and stability. Dreaming about catching a small fish It is one of the visions that expresses a useless job or going through some minor problems and fears, but he will overcome them soon. Interpretation of a dream about fishing for single womenCatching fish in a dream for an unmarried woman is interpreted as an unexpected collection of a lot of money, and it also indicates the imminent marriage of a person He has a good personality and good appearance. If an unmarried girl sees a stranger catching a fish in her dream, this symbolizes marriage to a man who does not reciprocate her feelings of love. Legalists in interpreting fishing with a hook for the Virgin say that it is an engagement or marriage soon, but just seeing the hook without fishing with it He is a wealthy man who will propose to her and fulfill all her dreams. If a single woman sees that she is fishing with her hand, this is evidence of a strong personality and a diligent girl who is making efforts and trying to achieve goals, while catching a big fish is achieving an important goal in her life. Interpretation of a dream about fishing for a married woman. Ibn Katheer interpreted seeing a married woman Fishing in a dream means cooperating in a project through which you will earn a lot of money. Fishing by hand expresses the husband’s kindness and improvement in his condition, but if he falls ill, it means a quick recovery. If a married woman sees a lot of fish, it is a source of livelihood and good for her and her family. As for catching large fish, It is a support for a man in his responsibilities and problems in life. A dream about fishing sharks in a dream is considered evidence of the collapse of fears, and it is a solution to all problems, marital disputes, and positive changes in life. The ability to manage household responsibilities. Interpretation of a dream about fishing for a pregnant woman, say jurists and commentators

title: Seeing vegetables in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: But in reality, this dream carries with it many different interpretations that are praiseworthy and beneficial to the dreamer or vice versa. Interpretation of seeing vegetables in a dream for a single girl: Seeing vegetables for a virgin girl is a sign of marriage to a man of good morals. If an unmarried girl sees fresh vegetables, this indicates a lot Of goodness for her. This dream also indicates the approach of marriage, and God knows best. When you see green onions in a dream for a virgin girl, this is a sign of good things that will happen to her. Green onions in a dream for a single woman, and it is good for her, and God knows best. But if a girl sees A virgin in a dream, this is a warning sign for her from someone. This dream also means for an unmarried girl that she is making a mistake. When an unmarried woman sees the color green in a dream, this is considered a good coming. A dream about the color green indicates that the virgin girl is entering into a formal relationship. It also indicates that a man enters her life and is the reason for her happiness. When she sees the green color fade and turn yellow, this means that there will be problems and crises in the future. As for eating tomatoes in a dream, it is evidence that he is in an emotional stage that reaches the stage of marriage. Seeing a lot Of tomatoes in a girl’s dream is evidence of the love of the people around her. See also: Interpretation of seeing vegetables in a dream and its meaning according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing vegetables in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman sees in a dream beautiful and abundant greenery inside the house, this is a praiseworthy dream that carries a lot for her. It is It indicates an increase in livelihood, as it indicates the end of debt, and the happiness that fills her home. Seeing the color green in a married woman’s dream indicates the approaching pregnancy, God willing. A dream about collecting vegetables from the house for a married woman is evidence of the presence of strong problems. This dream also shows that there are no Stability in her life, and God knows best. When a married woman sees herself eating a lot of tomatoes, this indicates that she is suffering from a mental illness. It also indicates immediate distress, which may lead to her becoming depressed and in need of money. When a person is given in a dream to a married woman, this indicates On the sustenance that God knows. Interpretation of seeing vegetables in a dream for a man and its meaning. Seeing vegetables in a dream means a promotion in one’s job. This dream also shows a new job coming to him, and God knows best. If a man sees lettuce in a dream, this will not benefit him, because it indicates the loss of work. As It has another interpretation, which is losing a lot of money, and God knows best. As for seeing spinach, it is evidence of exciting money and halal profits. Read also: Interpretation of dreams about buying vegetables for a divorced woman. The meaning of seeing vegetables in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. When a pregnant woman sees in a dream land planted with vegetables, this indicates She will give birth easily by God’s command. Seeing green spaces entering a pregnant woman’s home in a dream is evidence of the abundant food that will come with her new baby. Seeing a large land full of greenery is a sign of her husband’s work. Or it may be a promotion for him.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surat Taha in a dream or dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surat Taha in a dream or a dream: Many of those dreams that we dream about in a dream every day, and some of them are dreams that give the soul optimism, hope, and happiness, including those scary dreams, which are annoying, and it is worth noting that a type of dream is confusing, such that it is not known whether its interpretations are correct. Positive or not, a large number of scholars and experts in dream interpretation specialize in clarifying their interpretations. These dreams contain, and in this article we present to you the interpretation of a dream about seeing Surat Taha in a dream or dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surat Taha in a dream or dream, as seeing surahs of the Holy Qur’an in a dream are considered good and praiseworthy visions in general, and they differ in the interpretations they contain based on What the dreamer sees in detail, as well as based on his social status, and here in this context we explain the interpretation of the dream of seeing Surat Taha in a dream or a dream, is also: according to the scholar Ibn Sirin: seeing or hearing Surat Taha in a dream. It is evidence that the owner of the vision He will bless him with kindness and the poor. Also, this person is surrounded by many evil people, and you can get rid of them before they harm him. Likewise, seeing Surat Taha in a dream. It is evidence of the dreamer’s closeness to God Almighty and that he lives a calm and stable life. It will also remove all worries, difficulties and problems. Which he suffers from in his life. See also: Interpretation of dreams of seeing Jahamah in a dream for single women, married women, pregnant women, and men. Seeing Surah Taha in a single woman’s dream. Seeing Surah Taha in a dream for a single girl is considered one of the good visions, and it carries with it many connotations and different interpretations that indicate its goodness and strength. In addition to other interpretations that many commentators explain, and in the context we explain them to you. Seeing Surat Taha in a single woman’s dream is also: in the event that the person with insight is suffering from many problems and difficulties. This dream is evidence and indication that she will get rid of all the problems and difficulties in her life. Also, seeing Surat Taha in a dream is for an unmarried girl. It appears that this girl is surrounded by many evil people who are trying to harm her and that she will be able to get rid of them. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is reading Surat Taha. This is a dream that indicates the approaching date of this girl’s marriage, and that she will get married. From a good man with good morals. You will also live with him in a happy, stable and trouble-free life. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing horses in a dream for a married and single woman in detail. Interpretation of Surah Taha in a dream for a married woman. Despite the difference in the social status of those who see these dreams, this Quranic Surah If it is seen, it carries positive interpretations and good connotations due to the different status of the dreamer, and in the context of the paragraph we explain to you. The interpretation of Surat Taha in a dream for a married woman is also: If a married woman sees in a dream that she is reading Surat Taha. This dream is evidence that the dreamer lives a happy and stable life with his wife. It also indicates that he will get rid of all the problems and disagreements that he suffered from. Moreover, this vision for a married woman indicates that she will give good news.

title: Interpretation of seeing Indians in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing Indians in a dream, the meanings of seeing an Indian in a dream, what is the interpretation of seeing Indians in a dream and its ramifications, seeing Indians in a dream, Indians are a people who live in South Asia and seeing Indians in a dream has many connotations and the following explains the interpretation of seeing Indians in a dream through Our article today and through our vision website. Interpretation of seeing Indians in a dream. Seeing Indians in a dream indicates an increase in money and a change in circumstances for the better. Seeing Indians in a dream indicates the death of worries and problems and salvation from God. Seeing in a divine dream that he is an Indian indicates the strength of the dreamer’s personality and his ability to Make the necessary decisions in his life.Seeing Indians in a dreamIt indicates the dreamer’s love for adventure, exploration, and indulging in new experiences.Interpretation of seeing Indians in a dream for a single womanSeeing unmarried women wearing Indian clothes in a dreamIn reality, it shows that he will get married soon.Seeing unmarried Indians in a dream News appears Goodness comes to the dreamer. Seeing Indians in a dream indicates the ability of a visionary to make the right decisions. Seeing unmarried women in a dream, Indians making strange movements, indicates that the banner is exposed to major crises and problems. Interpretation of seeing Indians in a dream for a married woman. Seeing Indians in a dream for a married woman indicates stability in her life Marital. Seeing a married woman in a dream about Indians shows that he has a lot of money. Seeing a married woman in a dream about Indians announces the wisdom of the wife and the filth of her mind. Seeing Indians in a dream for a married woman shows wisdom in making fateful decisions. Interpretation of seeing Indians in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing Indians in a dream for a woman PregnantIndicates that the pregnancy period passes easily. Seeing Indians in a dream for a pregnant woman shows his ability to determine his destiny and make the right decisions. Seeing pregnant Indians indicates an easy and easy delivery. Seeing Indians in a dream for a man A man’s dream symbolizes his wisdom and mind. A man sees Indians in a dream doing strange things, which indicates that the viewer will be exposed to some adversity. Interpretation of seeing Native Americans in a dream. Seeing Native Americans in a dream indicates a person’s connection to a simple, uncomplicated, primitive life. Seeing Native Americans in a dream states that things will happen. The viewer does not want it. Seeing Native Americans in a dream indicates introversion and isolation. Interpretation of the visionary’s vision of becoming an Indian. title: Interpretation of a dream about diamonds and a gift of diamonds in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Usaimi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about diamonds Diamonds are precious metals, and every woman’s dream is to wear diamonds, and if she sees them in her dream, she will necessarily feel some comfort, but she will search for accurate interpretations of her vision to reassure her heart, and today she will do that. Come to all the interpretations given about seeing diamonds in a dream and what they mean. Interpretation of a dream about diamonds in a dream Seeing diamonds in a dream carries many omens for the dreamer because it indicates the fulfillment of dreams and ambitions, obtaining promotions, and other things that satisfy the dreamer in his life. Seeing an unmarried woman is evidence of her relationship The future of a young man who is morally committed, as well as the fact that he is rich and that she will be happy marrying him. For a married woman, the vision is a sign that she is living under the care of a husband who is able to take responsibility and offer her a lot of love and affection, which will make her feel like the queen of his heart. When he sees him A man in a dream acquires great wealth in the near future. He is characterized by justice and piety and does not accept earning through illegal means. Seeing him in a dream is evidence that the dreamer does not allow anyone to interfere in his life or plan it, as he alone is able to bear his responsibilities. If one sees more From a piece of diamond in a married woman’s dream, she may have many children who represent the source of her happiness in life. As for his loss, it may be a sign of troubles occurring in the life of the visionary, as he lived in comfort and peace of mind. Interpretation of a dream about diamonds in a dream for a son Sirin, the Imam said: Seeing him in abundance in a dream is evidence of the luxury of life, and that the dreamer does not work in this world except with expenses and extravagance, if in reality he is a frivolous person. But if the person is responsible, it is an indication of the legitimate profit that accrues to him from his work and diligence, and that he will not be extravagant. In what is of no benefit, rather he spends on his family and care for him. For their happiness without exaggeration or exaggeration. Ibn Sirin said that the girl who sees the diamond necklace indicates that she will soon move from one social situation to another and there will be some change in her standard of living for the better because she lives a life of luxury. The symbol of the diamond in Al-Osaimi’s dreamDr. Fahd Al-Osaimi confirmed that his vision in The dream means that he is entering a more distinguished phase in his life and that he will soon make a lot of profits, which will make him free from all the financial pressures that he has been exposed to in his life. Madi. The girl will also come out of her sadness if she suffered from delayed marriage and will find another direction in life to take a prominent place and name in society and make it for herself. A rich young man may be on his way to ask for the girl’s hand if he is of marriageable age, but if he is in the education stage, he will get The highest grades in the upcoming exams. He also said that it could express the abundance of knowledge and jurisprudence in religion, and that the person with the vision does not care much about the world, but rather abandons it and seeks the afterlife and strives for that. But if one sees that he has lost a piece of diamond, then he will lose his position Or he suffers from an illness, and he has to pay great attention and focus on his work and think

title: Interpretation of seeing dirt in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing dirt in a dream: Seeing dirt in a dream is one of the recurring visions that many people may see, and whoever sees it may feel upset and not know what the interpretation of this dream is. In fact, seeing dirt in a dream differs in its interpretation of the severity of the same vision factors. Dirt can be a sign of getting a lot of money and a lot of sustenance, and dirt can have other indicators and other signs such as distress and problems that appear, and we will talk in detail about each case, so let’s discuss the interpretation of seeing dirt in a dream.Interpretation of seeing dirt in a dream Scientists believe The interpretation is that if the dreamer sees in a dream that he is walking on dirt. This is an indication that he will make a lot of money easily and with little or no effort on his part. But if the dreamer sees that he is cleaning the corners of the house from dirt, then this dreamer suffers from many problems and fears. It indicates poverty, and Ibn Sirin says that when a man cleans his clothes of dirt, it indicates many quarrels in which he participates and this will cause him a lot of suffering and psychological pressure. Likewise, whoever sees himself cleaning his clothes of dust and dirt, this indicates separation between him and his wife. And that divorce is about to happen. But if the dreamer sees that he is collecting money from the dirt, this has two indicators: The first is that God will give him a great provision. The second is that this food brings great, long-awaited joy. But if the fortuneteller collects money from the dirt, but loses it or perishes It is a bad deed that indicates the death of one of his relatives or one of his parents. Walking on the dirt in a dream. Also, the interpretation of seeing yourself walking on the dirt in a dream means seriousness and trying to find sustenance. Whoever sees himself in a dream walking on the ground and then eating from it. This indicates God gives him a sum of money due to his hard work and effort. And if he carries the dirt that he walks on, then God gives him a sum of money equal to the amount of this dirt that he carries and goes to his home. Imam Al-Nabulsi believes that dirt in a dream means achieving abundant money after a long period of hard work, effort and fatigue. Likewise, dusting the house and picking it up means that he gets a lot of money through his wife. But if the wife sees that, it means a lot of money and projects, and this is her reason. But if the wife is the one who swept the dirt and left the house, then this It indicates the bankruptcy of the husband. But if the husband was the one who swept up the dirt and took it out of the house, this means the bankruptcy of the wife. Throwing dust on the head means a lot of problems and fears for the fortuneteller. Seeing the sky raining dust indicates that the situation has improved for the better. Interpretation of seeing dirt in a dream For a single girl, seeing dirt in a dream for a single girl who has never been married means that she will fall into a psychological crisis. As a result of a failed romantic relationship, but if she sees her clothes stuck to some dirt, this means that her marriage is near. Other interpretations to interpret seeing dirt in a dream. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is cleaning his house Of dirt and has missing loved ones, this indicates their closeness to him.And a vision

title: Interpretation of masturbation in a dream by Ibn Sirin and leading jurists

preview.html: Interpretation of masturbation in a dreamInterpretation of masturbation in a dream What are the interpretations that modern jurists have narrated about this dream? What is the interpretation of masturbating in front of people in a dream? There are many interpretations related to this vision which they will discover in the article below. Do you have a confusing dream? what are you waiting for; Google site Interpretation of dreams in Egypt Masturbation in a dream Masturbation in a dream spoils the vision, because the jurists said: If the dreamer masturbates in a dream and sees semen after waking up from the dream, then this scene is not included in the list of visions, but is called (the wet dream). Interpretation of a dream about masturbating in front of people in a dream warns the dreamer against engaging in behaviors outside the scope of morals and religion that could lead to scandals and many problems in waking life. If the dreamer sees that he is masturbating while stripping off his clothes in the dream, then the vision also indicates scandals and slander. The dreamer who practices masturbation in a dream sees that he practices it over and over again, and these scenes are interpreted as dream problems. The dreamer who suffers from sexual desires cannot satisfy them in the context of marriage, because his financial circumstances do not allow him to do so in reality, and therefore he sees the symbol of masturbation abundantly in Dream. Interpretation of masturbation in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin did not provide clear explanations for masturbation in a dream. However, most of the senior jurists said: Seeing masturbation is undesirable, and indicates falling into sins and transgressions. And if the dreamer sees that he is masturbating away from people’s eyes in In the dream, he keeps his secrets and hides them from others and does not talk about his privacy, because he is a secretive person in reality. And if the dreamer practices the habit of masturbation, and he sees in a dream that his mother saw him practicing this habit, then the vision shows that the dreamer is afraid that his family will discover that he practices this habit. Bad, and the dream is like nightmares because it disturbs the dreamer. Masturbation in a dream is for a single, unmarried woman who masturbates in a dream, because she is one of those who do not fear God in their actions, and commit immoral acts in reality. Some jurists said that the symbol of masturbation in a dream warns the dreamer against extravagance and even waste. He does not waste his money. Ibn Sirin’s secret dream interpretation for an unmarried woman. If the dreamer is already sick with a sexual disorder, he may dream that he masturbates from time to time in a dream. If emotional issues and sexual relations occupy space in the dreamer’s thoughts in reality, then he sees in the dream that he masturbates. Masturbation in a dream for a married woman: Interpretation of a dream about a married woman’s secret habit may indicate her husband’s failure to satisfy her sexual needs in reality. If a married woman sees that she is brazenly masturbating in front of a large number of people in a dream, this scene urges her to make positive changes in her personality. And give up some bad qualities so as not to lose her good behavior. Among people. If the dreamer sees one of her sons masturbating in a dream, then she is revealing one of this child’s secrets in reality, and it may be a bad secret.
